How many times did #Nifty50 hit All Time Highs (ATHs) in a year?

2008 → 4 ATHs 

2017 → 41 ATHs

2021 → 54 ATHs 

2022 → 6 ATHs 

2024 → 51 ATHs 

 Outlook:

2025 → Likely a pause year (10–20 ATHs).

2026 → Higher

content:
BankNifty Should Lead to Bleed 

Banking index often becomes the first casualty when liquidity shrinks.
History shows — when  BankNifty cracks,  Nifty soon follows.

 Banks = Liquidity Barometer
